actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, Treasury Department.

official_title: A bill to revise the tax treatment of retirement plans maintained by international organizations.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that deferred compensation plan requirements relating to: (1) the size of benefit payments; (2) limitations on payments of death benefits to beneficiaries other than spouses; and (3) "top heavy" plans, shall not apply to benefits attributable to a nonresident alien under a retirement plan maintained by an international organization which is tax-exempt under the International Organizations Immunities Act.

titles.title: A bill to revise the tax treatment of retirement plans maintained by international organizations.
